Question: How do I update Topic Definitions for Discord analytics? (Query 1)
Answer: To update Topic Definitions for Discord analytics, go to the Analytics dashboard, select 'Topic Definitions', and edit or add new topics as needed. For details, see: https://docs.withblaze.app/blaze/analytics/topic-definitions

Question: How can I start a Twitter DM campaign? (Query 2)
Answer: To start a Twitter DM campaign, navigate to Campaigns > Twitter DM Campaign in your Blaze dashboard and follow the setup guide. More info: https://docs.withblaze.app/blaze/campaigns/twitter-dm-campaign

Question: How do I integrate Blaze with my Discord server? (Query 3)
Answer: Go to Integrations in your Blaze dashboard, select Discord, and follow the authentication steps. Refer to: https://docs.withblaze.app/blaze/integrations/discord

Question: What analytics does Blaze provide for Twitter? (Query 4)
Answer: Blaze provides analytics such as engagement rates, follower growth, and campaign performance for Twitter. See: https://docs.withblaze.app/blaze/analytics/twitter

Question: How can I contact Blaze support? (Query 5)
Answer: You can contact Blaze support via the in-app chat or by emailing support@withblaze.app. More options: https://intercom.help/blaze-3d9c6d1123fd/en/

Question: How do I add a new team member to my Blaze workspace? (Query 6)
Answer: Go to Workspace Settings > Team Members, click 'Add Member', and enter their email address.

Question: What is the pricing for Blaze? (Query 7)
Answer: Blaze offers tiered pricing starting at $35/month. See all plans here: https://withblaze.app/pricing

Question: How do I reset my Blaze account password? (Query 8)
Answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the instructions sent to your email.

Question: Can Blaze schedule posts automatically? (Query 9)
Answer: Yes, Blaze allows you to schedule posts for supported platforms. Go to Campaigns > Schedule Post and set your desired time.

Question: Where can I find Blaze's API documentation? (Query 10)
Answer: Blaze's API documentation is available at: https://docs.withblaze.app/blaze/api

Question: Can I edit a Blaze form after creating it? (Query 11)
Answer: Yes, you can edit a Blaze form. Go to 'Forms' and click the 'Edit Form' button on the bottom right of the form's tab.

Question: How do I embed a Blaze form on my website? (Query 12)
Answer: Go to 'Forms,' click the 'Embed' button on the top right of the form's tab, copy the iframe code, and contact Blaze support to enable your domain for embedding.

Question: How do I close a Blaze form for entries? (Query 13)
Answer: Go to 'Forms,' select the form you wish to close, and click the 'Close Form' button at the top.

Question: Can I view deleted Blaze forms? (Query 14)
Answer: Yes. Go to 'Forms' and click on 'Deleted Forms' beside 'Active Forms' to view deleted forms.

Question: How do I generate a custom Discord analytics report? (Query 15)
Answer: Go to the Discord Analytics section, select the metrics you want, set the report frequency, and define the topics to include in your custom report.

Question: What types of topics can Blaze analyze in Discord communities? (Query 16)
Answer: Blaze can analyze topics such as bug reports, feedback, payments, rewards, scams, subscriptions, user interface, voting, account issues, order management, refunds, and pricing.

Question: How do I find topics discussed by my Discord community? (Query 17)
Answer: Use the Trend Explorer page in Discord Analytics to explore topics over time. Blaze automatically tags messages with pre-defined topics, and Premium users can customize these topics.

Question: Can Blaze forms be deleted? (Query 18)
Answer: Yes, go to 'Forms' and click the 'Delete Form' button on the bottom right of the form's tab.

Question: How do I edit the onboarding form after creating a rewards campaign? (Query 19)
Answer: Go to the activity tracker page, click 'Edit Campaign,' then 'Edit Form,' make changes, and click 'Update.' A success message will confirm the update.

Question: How do I edit the quest page after creating a rewards campaign? (Query 20)
Answer: Go to the activity tracker page, click 'Edit Campaign,' then 'Edit Quest,' make changes, and click 'Update.' A success message will confirm the update.

Question: Can users redeem points as rewards? (Query 21)
Answer: Yes, users can redeem their points as rewards in the form of NFTs based on their leaderboard standing.

Question: How do I get a Blaze API key? (Query 22)
Answer: Go to Settings  API Key  Generate API key. Alternatively, email Blaze support from your registered account email. Turnaround is typically under 24 hours.

Question: What is the Blaze API endpoint for community management? (Query 23)
Answer: Use the GraphQL endpoint: http://dashboard.withblaze.app/api/graphql-api for community management, CRM, and wallet intelligence.

Question: What authentication is required for Blaze API? (Query 24)
Answer: Include your API key in the request headers as `x-api-key`.

Question: How do I upload a lead segment in Blaze? (Query 25)
Answer: You can upload segments manually or by uploading a CSV file with the required data through the segments page.

Question: Can I create sub-segments from a segment? (Query 26)
Answer: Yes, go to the segments page, click 'Saved' segments, select a segment, apply filters, and click 'Create segment' to define a sub-segment.

Question: How often is Twitter and Discord integration data refreshed in Blaze? (Query 27)
Answer: Twitter and Discord integration data are refreshed every 24 hours.

Question: What blockchains does Blaze support for lead generation? (Query 28)
Answer: Blaze currently supports Ethereum, Arbitrum, BSC, Optimism, and Polygon for lead generation and segmenting.

Question: How can I request a custom audience segment in Blaze? (Query 29)
Answer: Go to the 'Find Leads' page, click 'Request Assisted Segment,' fill out the form, and the Blaze team will respond within 48 hours.

Question: How do I exclude previously saved leads from a segment? (Query 30)
Answer: Click the ellipsis next to the filters panel, select the checkbox for 'Exclude previously saved leads,' and click 'Apply.'
